lead_paragraph: HOLLAND--Fred, 64. DiedMarch 5, 2016. Born in Columbus, Ohio. Lived in NYC since '82. As a visual artist/performer, choreographer, he was widely recognized for his unique, poetic visual language and has been awarded many grants and residencies. His current show of sculpture is at Jack Tilton Gallery in NYC until April 9th. Survived by sister Anna Austin, brothers Aaron, David and Lawrence, Aunt Thelma Baker, and cousins. Memorial service at Middle Collegiate Church on April 10 at 3:30. 1/3
